named-native-query.name: tareasHumanas.obtenerTareasFinalizadas
named-native-query.query: SELECT taskId, processInstanceId, description, createdOn, name, processId FROM AuditTaskImpl ati WHERE ati.status = 'Completed' AND ati.actualOwner = :username

named-native-query.name: tareasHumanas.obtenerTareasCreadasSinPropietario
named-native-query.query: SELECT id, processInstanceId, description FROM Task WHERE status = 'Created' AND actualOwner_id IS NULL
